name: The Muscle
description: You're extremely tough. You are lethal with your fists, either from extensive martial arts training, or just a rough upbringing. You heal quicker than most, and you're very well suited for dangerous missions and protecting innocents from harm.

moves.name: Forceful presence
moves.description: You're so intimidating that others will do what you say to avoid whatever it is they think you'll do to them (+1 manipulate someone)

moves.name: Meat shield
moves.description: You take 1 less harm when protecting someone by getting between them and their attacker

moves.name: Fists of steel
moves.description: You deal 1 harm and get a bonus to unarmed attacks (+1 kick some ass)

moves.name: Dual wielding
moves.description: You get an extra serious weapon, and you can either attack multiple targets at once, or deal harm from both weapons to the same target

moves.name: Teddy bear
moves.description: You're not as mean as you look, and your allies can always count on you in a pinch (+1 help out)

moves.name: Surge of adrenaline
moves.description: You can use superhuman strength or speed in moments of grave peril (+1 act under pressure)

moves.name: Battle sense
moves.description: You've been in enough fights to see how they're going to go (+1 read a bad situation)
